mapper.select: SELECT IF(COUNT(*)=1, true, false) FROM room_players WHERE id=#{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_players (score, role, member_id, room_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{roomPlayer.score}, #{roomPlayer.role}, #{roomPlayer.memberId}, #{roomPlayer.roomId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt});
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM room_players WHERE room_id=#{roomId}
SELECT m.id, m.nickname, rp.score, m.score, dense_rank() OVER (ORDER BY rp.score DESC) FROM room_players rp JOIN members m ON m.id=rp.member_id WHERE rp.room_id=#{roomId} ORDER BY rp.created_at
